original_text: And I gave the deed of purchase to Baruch the son of Neriah son of Mahseiah, in the presence of Hanamel my cousin, in the presence of the witnesses who signed the deed of purchase, and in the presence of all the Judeans who were sitting in the court of the guard.
korean_text: 나의 숙부의 아들 하나멜과 매매 증서에 인 친 증인 앞과 시위대 뜰에 앉아 있는 유다 모든 사람 앞에서 그 매매 증서를 마세야의 손자 네리야의 아들 바룩에게 부치며

sentences.original_text: And I gave the deed of purchase
to Baruch the son of Neriah son of Mahseiah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 마세야의 아들 네리야의 아들 바룩에게 주었고,

sentences.original_text: in the presence of Hanamel my cousin,
in the presence of the witnesses
who signed the deed of purchase,
and in the presence of all the Judeans
who were sitting in the court of the guard.
sentences.korean_translation: 시위대 뜰에 앉아 있던 그들 앞에서였다.
